sourcesContent:
import uniqid from 'uniqid' import { education } from '../../portfolio' import './Education.css' const Education = () => { if (!education.length) return null return (

Education

{education.map((edu) => (

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution}
{edu.period}
GPA: {edu.gpa}

{edu.description}

))}
) } export default Education
